sn22.88:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn22.88:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma assaji kassapakarame viharati abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano.
sn22.88:1.3: Atha kho ayasma assaji upatthake amantesi:
sn22.88:1.4: “etha tumhe, avuso, yena bhagava tenupasankamatha; upasankamitva mama vacanena bhagavato pade sirasa vandatha:
sn22.88:1.8: ‘sadhu kira, bhante, bhagava yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya’”ti.
sn22.88:1.9: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato assajissa patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn22.88:1.11: sadhu kira, bhante, bhagava yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
sn22.88:2.1: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma assaji tenupasankami.
sn22.88:2.2: Addasa kho ayasma assaji bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
sn22.88:2.4: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam assajim etadavoca:
sn22.88:2.7: Nisidi bhagava pannatte asane. Nisajja kho bhagava ayasmantam assajim etadavoca:
sn22.88:2.8: “kacci te, assaji, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam …pe… patikkamosanam pannayati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn22.88:3.1: “Na me, bhante, khamaniyam …pe… abhikkamosanam pannayati no patikkamo”ti.
sn22.88:3.2: “Kacci te, assaji, na kinci kukkuccam na koci vippatisaro”ti?
sn22.88:3.3: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakam kukkuccam anappako vippatisaro”ti.
sn22.88:3.4: “Kacci pana tam, assaji, atta silato na upavadati”ti?
sn22.88:3.5: “Na kho mam, bhante, atta silato upavadati”ti.
sn22.88:3.6: “No ce kira tam, assaji, atta silato upavadati, atha kinca te kukkuccam ko ca vippatisaro”ti?
sn22.88:3.7: “Pubbe khvaham, bhante, gelanne passambhetva passambhetva kayasankhare viharami, soham samadhim nappatilabhami.
sn22.88:3.8: Tassa mayham, bhante, tam samadhim appatilabhato evam hoti:
sn22.88:3.10: “Ye te, assaji, samanabrahmana samadhisaraka samadhisamanna tesam tam samadhim appatilabhatam evam hoti:
sn22.88:4.8: So sukhance vedanam vedayati, sa ‘anicca’ti pajanati. ‘Anajjhosita’ti pajanati. ‘Anabhinandita’ti pajanati.
sn22.88:4.9: Dukkhance vedanam vedayati, sa ‘anicca’ti pajanati. ‘Anajjhosita’ti pajanati. ‘Anabhinandita’ti pajanati.
sn22.88:4.10: Adukkhamasukhance vedanam vedayati, sa ‘anicca’ti pajanati …pe… ‘anabhinandita’ti pajanati.
sn22.88:4.11: So sukhance vedanam vedayati, visamyutto nam vedayati;
sn22.88:4.12: dukkhance vedanam vedayati, visamyutto nam vedayati;
sn22.88:4.13: adukkhamasukhance vedanam vedayati, visamyutto nam vedayati.
sn22.88:4.14: So kayapariyantikance vedanam vedayamano ‘kayapariyantikam vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati. Jivitapariyantikance vedanam vedayamano ‘jivitapariyantikam vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
sn22.88:4.15: ‘Kayassa bheda uddham jivitapariyadana idheva sabbavedayitani anabhinanditani sitibhavissanti’ti pajanati.
sn22.88:5.1: Seyyathapi, assaji, telanca paticca, vattinca paticca, telappadipo jhayeyya;
sn22.88:5.2: tasseva telassa ca vattiya ca pariyadana anaharo nibbayeyya.
sn22.88:5.3: Evameva kho, assaji, bhikkhu kayapariyantikam vedanam vedayamano ‘kayapariyantikam vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati. Jivitapariyantikam vedanam vedayamano ‘jivitapariyantikam vedanam vedayami’ti pajanati.
sn22.88:5.4: ‘Kayassa bheda uddham jivitapariyadana idheva sabbavedayitani anabhinanditani sitibhavissanti’ti pajanati”ti.
